alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 3:15PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected with near-blizzard conditions possible. Additional snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 MPH. * WHERE...Morrill and Box Butte Counties including Hemingford and Alliance. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Extremely dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
